message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.HC, cs.SI, cs.CL 

This paper discusses the evaluation of recommender systems, which is a common topic in information retrieval (cs.IR) and machine learning (cs.LG). The study also considers the impact of missing data on evaluation metrics, which is relevant to human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and social and information networks (cs.SI). Finally, the paper discusses the limitations of existing offline evaluation techniques, which is a topic in computational linguistics (cs.CL) as well.
